CustomField.description: Indicate if this lead is from a state which requires additional consent
CustomField.formula:
IF(State="NE",IMAGE('/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/download/0681R00000KmuhM', 'Consent Required',60,100),
IF(State="DE",IMAGE('/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/download/0681R00000KmuhM', 'Consent Required', 60,100),
IF(State="CO",IMAGE('/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/download/0681R00000KmuhM', 'Consent Required', 60,100),
IF(State="OK",IMAGE('/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/download/0681R00000KmuhM', 'Consent Required', 60,100),
IMAGE("/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/download/0681R00000Kmuhl",'Consent Not Required', 60,100) ))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicate if this lead is from a state which requires additional consent
CustomField.label: State Consent
